Attribute.Name: Calculated Volume
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="{
    value1:=IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="fl oz (US)",
        value('TradeItemVolume', 'unece.unit.MLT'),
        IF(
            PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="ml",
            value('TradeItemVolume', 'unece.unit.OZA'),
            IF(
                PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="gal (US)",
                value('TradeItemVolume', 'unece.unit.LTR'),
                IF(
                    PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="l",
                    value('TradeItemVolume', 'unece.unit.GLL'),
                    ""
                )
            )
        )
    ),
    value2:=if(round(value1, 2)="0","0",round(value1, 2))
}concatenate(
    value2,
     IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="fl oz (US)",
        " ml",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="gal (US)",
        " l",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="l",
        " gal (US)",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemVolume')="ml",
        " fl oz (US)",
        ""
    )
)"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to store the converted Volume Value.
